chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following issue:
Hello, 
My package was supposed to arrive at my neighbor's (with all necessary information described) (and I'm away traveling) but the delivery person left immediately. I no longer see the possibility of reprogramming the delivery and I'm afraid it will come back to you.... When receiving could you proceed with a refund? I'll reorder in about a month. Thank you in advance

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile, 

The customer does not know where the package is.

Unable to track the tracking number.

Thanks for your help.

Regards,

François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the issue. 

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile,

DPD informs us that they have been unable to deliver the parcel : https://www.dpdgroup.com/be/mydpd/my-parcels/incoming?parcelNumber=10694000291184

The customer is no longer at home, but abroad, and would like a refund for his order.

Regards,

François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding the issue and they are in the process of recalling the parcel. In the meantime, please forward the following instructions to the customer.

1. Ask the neighbour to refuse the parcel in the unlikely case a delivery attempt is made.
2. If the parcel is delivered and the neighbour was unable to refuse the parcel, do not open the product packaging. Use the return label provided by BackMarket and send the device back immediately.

By doing the following, you would be sure to receive a much FASTER REFUND for this order. 

We will update you if the order is succesfully cancelled and proceed with a refund.

Thank you.
Regards, 
JH

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
